info.name: Ouptel Admin API v1
info.description: Complete API collection for Ouptel Admin Panel - includes authentication, posts, comments, social features, account verification with Blue & Golden badges, and comprehensive settings management (12 setting categories). All APIs mimic old WoWonder API structure for backward compatibility.

request.description: Login with username+password or email+password.

request.description: Search pages by name, title, or description. Authentication is optional - if provided, shows is_liked and is_owner status. Supports pagination and optional category filtering.

Get a single page by ID. Returns full page details including category, sub-category, owner, likes count, posts count, and user-specific flags (is_liked, is_owner). request.description:
Edit/update page details. Only the page owner can edit.

**Image Upload:**
- Use multipart/form-data (this request is already configured)
- Avatar field: max 5MB, formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP
- Cover field: max 10MB, formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP
- Select files by clicking on the 'avatar' or 'cover' fields and choosing 'Select Files'

**All Fields Optional:**
- Only include fields you want to update
- You can update just images, just text fields, or both together
- Remove any fields you don't want to update

Get page analytics/statistics (mimics old API: ajax_loading.php?link1=page-setting&page={page_name}&link3=analytics). Only the page owner can view analytics.

**Returns:**
- Likes statistics: total, today, this week, this month, this year
- Posts statistics: total, today, this week, this month, this year
- Growth metrics: week-over-week, month-over-month, year-over-year growth percentages
- Recent activity: last 10 users who liked the page, last 5 posts

**Parameters:**
- {id} can be page ID (integer) or page name (string)
- Example: /api/v1/pages/1/analytics or /api/v1/pages/mypage/analytics

**Authentication:**
- Required: Bearer token
- Must be the page owner

Get a single group by ID. Returns full group details including category, sub-category, member count, join status, admin status, and owner information. Authentication is optional - public groups can be viewed without auth. If authenticated, shows additional info like is_joined (correctly reflects join status), is_pending, is_admin, is_owner. The is_joined status properly handles type mismatches and automatically marks group owners as joined.
Get all blog categories with metadata including article count for each category. No authentication required.

Get a single blog/article by ID. Returns full article details including content, category, author, view counts, and like status. Works without authentication for public articles. Set increment_view=false to prevent view count increment.

item.name: Posts - Get Posts (Filter by Activity Type)

query.description: Activity type: playing, travelling, watching, listening, feeling

request.description:
Get posts filtered by activity type.

Valid types:
- playing: Posts where user is playing a game
- travelling: Posts where user is travelling to a location
- watching: Posts where user is watching something
- listening: Posts where user is listening to music/audio
- feeling: Posts where user is expressing a feeling/emotion

Response includes:
- post_playing: Game name (if type=playing)
- post_travelling: Location (if type=travelling)
- post_watching: What they're watching (if type=watching)
- post_listening: What they're listening to (if type=listening)
- post_feeling: Feeling type (if type=feeling)
- activity: Object with type, label, value, text, and icon (for feelings)
